cast.overview: In the poverty-stricken favelas of Rio de Janeiro in the 1970s, two young men choose different paths. Rocket is a budding photographer who documents the increasing drug-related violence of his neighborhood, while José “Zé” Pequeno is an ambitious drug dealer diving into a dangerous life of crime.
cast.title: City of God

details.biography: Started acting as a child in a theater group that became a cultural reference in the city of Rio de Janeiro. Gained widespread recognition for a memorable role in the acclaimed film City of God. Recently reprised the character in City of God – The Fight Goes On, a series inspired by the Brazilian cinema classic.
details.name: Felipe Paulino
